00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"

00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples

00044 
00045 
00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void Dual_ADC_Configuration(void);
00048 void TM_Configuration(void);
00049 
00050 void ADC_MainRoutine(void);
00051 
00052 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 u32 gADC0_Result[2];
00054 u32 gADC1_Result[2];
00055 vu32 gADC0_CycleEndOfConversion;
00056 vu32 gADC1_CycleEndOfConversion;
00057 
00058 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00060   * @brief  Main program.
00061   * @retval None
00062   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00063 int main(void)
00064 {
00065   RETARGET_Configuration();
00066 
00067   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00068   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00069   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00070 
00071   Dual_ADC_Configuration();
00072 
00073   TM_Configuration();
00074 
00075   ADC_Cmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00076   ADC_Cmd(HT_ADC1, ENABLE);
00077 
00078   /* Enable TM which will trigger ADC start of conversion periodically                                      */
00079   TM_Cmd(HT_GPTM0, ENABLE);
00080 
00081   while (1)
00082   {
00083     ADC_MainRoutine();
00084   }
00085 }
00086 
00087 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00088   * @brief  ADC main routine.
00089   * @retval None
00090   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00091 void ADC_MainRoutine(void)
00092 {
00093   if (gADC0_CycleEndOfConversion && gADC1_CycleEndOfConversion)
00094   {
00095     printf("ADC Result Seq0:%4u Seq1:%4u Seq2:%4u Seq3:%4u\r\n", gADC0_Result[0], gADC0_Result[1], gADC1_Result[0], gADC1_Result[1]);
00096     gADC0_CycleEndOfConversion = FALSE;
00097     gADC1_CycleEndOfConversion = FALSE;
00098   }
00099 }
00100 
00101 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00102   * @brief  Dual ADC configuration.
00103   * @retval None
00104   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00105 void Dual_ADC_Configuration(void)
00106 {
00107   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00108     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00109     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00110     CKCUClock.Bit.ADC0 = 1;
00111     CKCUClock.Bit.ADC1 = 1;
00112     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00113   }
00114 
00115   /* Configure AFIO mode as ADC0 function                                                                   */
00116   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADC0_5_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADC0_5_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00117   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADC0_6_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADC0_6_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00118 
00119   /* Configure AFIO mode as ADC1 function                                                                   */
00120   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_ADC1_7_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_ADC1_7_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC1);
00121 
00122   { /* ADC related settings                                                                                 */
00123     /* CK_ADC frequency is set to (CK_AHB / 64)                                                             */
00124     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(CKCU_ADCPRE_ADC0, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV64);
00125     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(CKCU_ADCPRE_ADC1, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV64);
00126 
00127     /* Dual Cascade Regular mode, delayTime = 0 (Synchronous)                                               */
00128     ADC_DualModeConfig(HT_ADC1, DUAL_CASCADE_REGULAR, 0, 0);
00129 
00130     /* One Shot mode, sequence length = 2                                                                   */
00131     ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HT_ADC0, ONE_SHOT_MODE, 2, 0);
00132     ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HT_ADC1, ONE_SHOT_MODE, 2, 0);
00133 
00134     /* ADC conversion time = (Sampling time + Latency) / CK_ADC = (1.5 + ADST + 12.5) / CK_ADC              */
00135     /* Set ADST = 36, sampling time = 1.5 + ADST                                                            */
00136     /* Set ADC0 conversion sequence as channel n                                                            */
00137     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, HTCFG_ADC0_5_ADC_CH, 0, 36);
00138     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, HTCFG_ADC0_6_ADC_CH, 1, 36);
00139 
00140     /* Set ADC1 conversion sequence as channel n                                                            */
00141     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC1, HTCFG_ADC1_7_ADC_CH, 0, 36);
00142     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC1, ADC_CH_VDD_VREF, 1, 36);
00143 
00144     /* Set GPTM0 CH3O as ADC trigger source                                                                 */
00145     ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH3O);
00146   }
00147 
00148   /* Enable ADC cycle end of conversion interrupt                                                           */
00149   ADC_IntConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC, ENABLE);
00150   ADC_IntConfig(HT_ADC1, ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC, ENABLE);
00151 
00152   /* Enable the ADC interrupts                                                                              */
00153   NVIC_EnableIRQ(ADC0_IRQn);
00154   NVIC_EnableIRQ(ADC1_IRQn);
00155 }
00156 
00157 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00158   * @brief  TM configuration.
00159   * @retval None
00160   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00161 void TM_Configuration(void)
00162 {
00163   /* Configure GPTM0 channel 3 as PWM output mode used to trigger ADC start of conversion every 1 second    */
00164 
00165   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00166     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00167     CKCUClock.Bit.GPTM0 = 1;
00168     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00169   }
00170 
00171   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00172 
00173     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00174        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00175        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00176     */
00177     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00178 
00179     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = (SystemCoreClock / 40000) - 1; // GPTM Clock is 40K
00180     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 40000 - 1;
00181     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00182     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00183     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00184     TM_TimeBaseInit(HT_GPTM0, &TimeBaseInit);
00185   }
00186 
00187   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00188 
00189     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00190        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00191        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00192     */
00193     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00194     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_3;
00195     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;
00196     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00197     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00198     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00199     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00200     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00201     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00202     OutInit.Compare = 20000 - 1;
00203     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00204     TM_OutputInit(HT_GPTM0, &OutInit);
00205   }
00206 
00207   TM_IntConfig(HT_GPTM0, TM_INT_CH3CC, ENABLE);
00208   NVIC_EnableIRQ(GPTM0_IRQn);
00209 }

00215   * @param  uline: error line source number.

00218 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00220   /*
00221      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00222      Debug message can be added here.
00223      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00224   */
00225 
00226   while (1)
00227   {
00228   }
00229 }
